text: Anata gata ni kinji rarete iru (kekkon) wa, anata gata no haha, joji, shimai, chichikata no oba, hahagata no oba, kyodai no joji, shimai no joji, junyu shita uba, do chichi no shimai, tsuma no haha, anata gataga kankei shite iru tsuma no unda yoiku-chu no yojo, anata gataga sono tsuma to, imada kankei shite inainaraba sono tsurego o tsuma ni shite mo tsumi wanai. Oyobi anata gata no unda musuko no tsuma, mata dojini futari no shimai o metoru koto (mo kinji rareru). Sugisatta mukashi no koto wa towanaiga. Arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
